    • AddCoupon

      boolean AddCoupon(Coupon coupon) throws CouponSystemException
      Adds a coupon to the DB - based on the details listed in the param
      Parameters:
      coupon - a 'Coupon' class instance containing coupon details
      Returns:
      true if succeeded, false if failed.
      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - If we get any SQL exception. Details are provided

    • GetCouponIDByTitle

      int GetCouponIDByTitle(String title) throws CouponSystemException
      Returns a coupon's ID based on title (unique)
      Parameters:
      title - coupon's title
      Returns:
      couponID if coupon exists, -1 if coupon doesn't exist.
      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - If we get any SQL exception. Details are provided

    • AddCouponPurchase

      boolean AddCouponPurchase(int customerID, int couponID) throws CouponSystemException
      Add a Coupon purchase in DB - based on the details listed in the params
      Parameters:
      customerID - the customer ID of the customer that wants to buy the coupon
      couponID - the coupon ID of the coupon the customer wants to buy
      Returns:
      true if succeeded, false if failed.

      Parameters:
      customerID - the customer ID of the customer that wants to delete the coupon

      true if succeeded, false if failed.
